text:
December 8, 1959
Dr. Marshall McLuhan
96 Saint Joseph Street
Toronto 5, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshall:
Not sure precisely what she's doing, but someone suggested that
Dr. Florence Freedman, School of Education, Hunter College, New York,
has a project that should fit in with yours.
Might want to contact her.
Next stop Austin, Texas, then Washington for FCC appearance. "Just
passing by" the office it seems.
Best,
hjs:rs
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
